pages.text: Terra Moss is one of the two herbs initially available to a budding druid, with an affinity for the connection between plants and the earth. Terra Moss Spores can be found by breaking tall grass - however, Terra Moss does not grow like a conventional crop.

Terra Moss Spores can be planted on cobblestone that is adjacent to water to transform the cobblestone into moss stone - and Terra Moss itself can be harvested from moss stone by using a knife on the block.$(br2)Moss stone found through other means may also be harvested for Terra Moss.

pages.name: Terra Moss
pages.text: Right click a block of mossy cobblestone with a knife in hand to get Terra Moss.
